info.title: Orbit Enterprise Lob API
info.description: Orbit Enterprise Lob API's for handle lob

message.example: A required parameter was missing in the request
The server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request

endorserDid.description: The unique identifier for the external endorser, required if `endorserDid` is provided.

endorserName.description: The name of the external endorser. It is required if either `endorserDid` or `endorserInvitationURL` is provided.

lobDisplayName.description: Display name of organization registering the LOB

lobContactName.description: Name of the LOB Requestor (must contain at least first and last name)

lobOrganizationName.description: Name of the Organization registering the LOB

lobRole.description: Specify the role of the LOB. Allowed Values: HOLDER, ISSUER, VERIFIER

lobTenancy.description: Specify if the agent is a single-wallet agent or if it supports multiple wallets. Allowed Values: SINGLE, MULTI_TENANT

didMethod.description: Specify the DID Method of the LOB. Allowed Values: did:web, did:sov

lobProtocol.description: Specify the message protocol that the LOB supports. Allowed Values: AIP2_0, OID4VC

writeLedgerId.description: If the DID of the LOB is a did:sov, please specify the ledger on which the DID will be stored. Allowed value is 1 (points to BCovrin ledger)

credentialFormat.description: Specify the credential format that the LOB supports. Allowed Values: ANONCREDS, JSON_LD and SD_JWT

lobTrustUrl.description: The Trust URL associated with the Lob Issuer, providing a link to the issuer’s trust information.

lobTrustAPIKey.description: The Trust API Key associated with the Lob Issuer, providing a link to the issuer’s trust information.

lobExternalEndorser.description: Indicates whether the Lob Issuer has its own external endorser. If true, the `endorserDetails` field must also be provided.

endorserDetails.description: External endorser information. This is required when `lobExternalEndorser` is true.

tenantApprovalRequired.description: Indicates whether approval is required for the tenant joining.

responseDetails.example: Your request was successfully created. You will receive confirmation over registered email.
responseDetails.description: Standardized responseDetails of the response body for series 200 response

success.description: Should be “true” in the response body for series 200 response

message.description: Standardized description of the response body for series 200, 300, 400 and 500 response

message.example: An object with the provided unique attributes already exists (eg. LOB with a specific name already exists)

transactionId.description: The ID provided via email when you registered your LOB

publicDID.description: The public Decentralized Identifier (DID) associated with the LOB.

responseDetails.example: Agent is created successfully. The public DID of the will created once the endorser is accepted the connection request.
responseDetails.description: Agent is created successfully. The public DID of the will created once the endorser is accepted the connection request.

success.description: Should be “true” in the response body for series 200 response

message.description: Standardized description of the response body for series 200, 300, 400 and 500 response

message.example: Invalid API Key included in the request

lobTrustUrl.description: The trust url for Trust registry

lobTrustAPIKey.description: The API key for Trust registry

success.description: Should be “true” in the response body for series 200 response

message.description: Standardized description of the response body for series 200, 300, 400 and 500 response

data.description: Details of Trust Registry fields updated

username.description: Username or email used for login

access_token.description: Access token to be used in Authorization header (Bearer)

expires_in.description: Lifetime in seconds of the access token

refresh_expires_in.description: Lifetime in seconds of the refresh token

refresh_token.description: Refresh token to obtain new access tokens

id_token.description: ID token containing user identity claims

message.example: User created successfully in the organization. A password reset email has been sent.

refresh_token.description: Refresh token to be genrate to new access token

multiTenantLobId.description: The ID of the multi-tenant LOB to join

lobDisplayName.description: Display name of organization registering the LOB

lobOrganizationName.description: Name of the Organization registering the LOB

lobRole.description: Specify the role of the LOB. Allowed Values: HOLDER, ISSUER, VERIFIER

didMethod.description: Specify the DID Method of the LOB. Allowed Values: did:web, did:sov

writeLedgerId.description: If the DID of the LOB is a did:sov, please specify the ledger on which the DID will be stored. Allowed value is 1 (points to BCovrin ledger)

credentialFormat.description: Specify the credential format that the LOB supports. Allowed Values: ANONCREDS, JSON_LD and SD_JWT

lobTrustUrl.description: The Trust URL associated with the Lob Issuer, providing a link to the issuer’s trust information.

lobTrustAPIKey.description: The Trust API Key associated with the Lob Issuer, providing a link to the issuer’s trust information.

lobExternalEndorser.description: Indicates whether the Lob Issuer has its own external endorser. If true, the `endorserDetails` field must also be provided.

endorserDetails.description: External endorser information. This is required when `lobExternalEndorser` is true.

success.description: True if the tenant join operation was successful

message.example: Tenant subwallet created and details sent via email
message.description: Message describing the outcome of the request

data.description: Reserved for future use, empty for now

totalItems.description: The total number of items available in the dataset.

itemCount.description: The number of items on the current page.

itemsPerPage.description: The number of items displayed per page.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages available based on the dataset size and items per page.

currentPage.description: The current page number being viewed.

success.description: Should be “true” in the response body for series 200 response

message.description: Standardized description of the response body for series 200, 300, 400 and 500 response

state.description: New state for the tenant request (APPROVED, REJECTED)

success.description: Should be true for successful requests

message.example: Tenant request approved successfully and details sent via email
message.description: Human-readable message about the operation result

method.description: Method for the requested DID.Supported methods are 'web', 'sov', and any other registered method.

did.description: Specify final value of the did (including did:: prefix)if the method supports or requires so.

seed.description: Optional seed to use for DID, Must be enabled in configuration before use.
